page.title: 15 General
page.content: {Communications:}In our area there are {2}public telephones; 1 south of{Potts {Stores (Long Bennington),}1 near the crossroads{(Staunton). Also there are{3}post boxes; 1 north of{Lilley Street (Long Bennington),}1 near where{Church Street}joins {Acklands Lane (Long Bennington),}1 near the crossroads{(Staunton).} Our area code is{Loveden (0400).}We are in the{Peterborough}and{Newark telephone directories. {Supernatural:}In our area there are said to be three{ghosts}in the{Manor, one of a{black labrador}which died in {1978,}one is a{piano}which still plays although it was sold and the player was sacked. The third a{chef} saw while he was cooking, it was an {old lady}with a lantern, she said, {"Look after yourself".
